words.def: the handwear used by fielders in playing baseball
any of various small mouselike rodents of the family Cricetidae (especially of genus Microtus) having a stout short-tailed body and inconspicuous ears and inhabiting fields or meadows
a strong positive emotion of regard and affection
balcony consisting of the forward section of a theater mezzanine
edible seeds or roots or stems or leaves or bulbs or tubers or nonsweet fruits of any of numerous herbaceous plant
the basic unit of money in Bulgaria
A narrow sea inlet, particularly in the Shetland Islands, similar to a fjord.
a segment of the trunk of a tree when stripped of branches
a colloid in a more solid form than a sol
an inflated feeling of pride in your superiority to others
a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
